A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really hated this movie. There is no hero's journey.  There is a one lane road chase where the rebels are running out of gas. There is no learning. There is no growth. There is no Luke Skywalker.  Someone looks like him\, but he can't be Luke cause this guy was going to kill his sleeping nephew. Luke stood up to the Emperor and this guy couldn't be bothered to leave a planet to save his sister. I wish I had never seen this movie.
